channel.title: Series 20 on The Median Duck
channel.description: Recent content in Series 20 on The Median Duck

item.title: Series 20, Episode 1: Soft Reboot
item.description: Your Task Let’s Start this Chase: New Cast … Same Sort of Analysis What Have We Learnt Today? Your Task Using task data up to and including Episode 1 of Series 20 of Taskmaster UK, generate episode and series odds for each contestant. Let’s Start this Chase: New Cast … Same Sort of Analysis Figure 1: Let’s Start this Series 20 Chase! N.B. No shade intended. With Series 20 of UK Taskmaster now in full swing, it’s time to perform a new set of analysis and modelling techniques.
